mapper.update: UPDATE c_work_calendar SET day_=#{day,jdbcType=DATE}, isWorkDay_=#{isWorkDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_=#{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id_=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM c_work_calendar WHERE day_ BETWEEN #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system_='public'
select * from c_work_calendar where day_ >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system_ = 'public' and isWorkDay_ = '1' ORDER BY day_

select * from c_work_calendar where day_ >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system_ = #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND isWorkDay_ = '1' UNION SELECT * from c_work_calendar WHERE day_ >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND day_ NOT IN (select day_ from c_work_calendar where day_ >= #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE} AND system_ = #{system,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND system_ = 'public' AND isWorkDay_ = '1' ORDER BY day_
